response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This exceptional item carries a significant value of $800,000 to me, reflecting its unique features, quality, and the effort put into its creation. I am offering this remarkable product to you at an exclusive price of $750,000, providing you with an opportunity to own a piece of unparalleled craftsmanship. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer. I am confident that you will find immense value in this product, just as it has brought satisfaction to my endeavors.", "product_price": 750000}
